text: Hi all, Anyway to add custom properties in blog posts such as text inputs and dropdown while create blogs like tags?

you can add a static module to your blog template like this
`{% module "my_custom_property" path="@HubSpot/rich_text", label="My custom property" %}`
 then when you update your blog post with the value you can access it in blog listing etc

Hi Everyone,
I am using an API to display data on the Listing page of the HubSpot Website. I am using a card layout. When a user clicks on any particular card, it should open a single page with dynamic content, similar to how a blog post works on HubSpot. How can I achieve this? Please help me, anyone. Thank you.
